text: Linda Garrou (January 17, 1943 â€“ March 19, 2022) was an American Democratic politician and educator. She was a member of the North Carolina General Assembly from 1999 until 2013. Garoru was born in Atlanta, Georgia. Garrou died on March 19, 2022 in Winston-Salem, North Carolina at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== *North Carolina General Assembly - Senator Linda Garrou official NC Senate website Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Atlanta Category:Educators from Atlanta Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Educators from North Carolina Category:People from Winston- Salem, North Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Linda Garrou
